title: pari pOvalera
sahitya:
pAri pOvalerA nIrajAptuDu veDalerA 
(pAri)

anupallavi

nArI maNulu dArini gana dUrEru kanuka 
(pAri)

caraNam 1

Uri pOyina krUruDaumaka DurujEri E mAraTincenA
ArItulavi sArincukora kErA nEnipuTanE
(pAri)

caraNam 2

bhAvamAmanO bhAvumu teliE vitAlanainAvatincuTakE
vELadorikE vEyanEruvE vEgamE gAnaka 
(pAri)

caraNam 3

cElamITcetavEla nEnupa kELisalpanu vELalEdu
nIkAlanpaDinE cAlavEDada tAlavaLa lOlanE 
(pAri)
